explanation: [0-0] A giant in black clothing, with a head composed of a toilet and a human head, stands on a city street, facing right, holding two pistols in his hands.

[0-4] Then, the giant opens fire, muzzle flashes erupting from the pistols. In the distance, three men in suits stand on the ground. Each man has a different electronic device on his head: cameras on the left and right, and a camera on the middle man's head who also holds a black gun in his hand.
